name: Akshay Thakur
position: BD @ Lodha | IIM Ahmedabad | IIT Kharagpur
about: 5+ years of experience in real estate under diverse roles and responsibilities, with a background in civil engineering (IIT Kharagpur) and MBA from IIM Ahmedabad.

current_company.name: Lodha
current_company.title: BD @ Lodha | IIM Ahmedabad | IIT Kharagpur

positions.subtitle: Lodha
positions.description: Responsible for AOP achievement, sales process excellence and market share control via inventory and pricing management, product + market research, competition monitoring and stakeholder management for 5 macro-markets in MMR and 2 business verticals; overseeing 40,000+ customer walk-ins and pre-sales revenue generation of INR 5,600 Cr over 2 years; working in close co-ordination with the CSO, 3 RCEOs, 15 sales and CRM heads and 30+ MIS, SAP and Salesforce support members.
positions.title: Associate General Manager - Sales Strategy
positions.description_html: Responsible for AOP achievement, sales process excellence and market share control via inventory and pricing management, product + market research, competition monitoring and stakeholder management for 5 macro-markets in MMR and 2 business verticals; overseeing 40,000+ customer walk-ins and pre-sales revenue generation of INR 5,600 Cr over 2 years; working in close co-ordination with the CSO, 3 RCEOs, 15 sales and CRM heads and 30+ MIS, SAP and Salesforce support members. <!---->

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: Assigned to B2B Business Development Division, tasked with the objective to study the power markets across the globe and apply the learnings to the Indian Energy Exchange (IEX), developing and testing short and long-term forecasting models using various combinations of statistical and ML-based tools, such as SARIMA, TBATS, XGBoost etc. enabling to create a RE+IEX portfolio which improves energy supply reliability by 25% with a 12% premium over the existing RE costs.
experience.description_html: Assigned to B2B Business Development Division, tasked with the objective to study the power markets across the globe and apply the learnings to the Indian Energy Exchange (IEX), developing and testing short and long-term forecasting models using various combinations of statistical and ML-based tools, such as SARIMA, TBATS, XGBoost etc. enabling to create a RE+IEX portfolio which improves energy supply reliability by 25% with a 12% premium over the existing RE costs. <!---->

experience.title: Project Management Associate
experience.description: Deep-diving into building co-working spaces, was responsible for setting up 2 hubs with 1450+ seats and 71,000 sqft carpet area. Managed budgets of Rs 17 crores across 2 projects with 30+ teams on-board, directly supervising 200+ personnel on sites.Also led customisation works for enterprise clients such as Cleartrip, Johnson&Johnson, OYO Life and in the Western region for seating 500+ employees.

experience.title: Manager - Projects
experience.description: Led site operations, design co-ordination, material planning, vendor management and quality control + safety audits for a 44,000 sqft banquet complex on the shores of Eco Park Lake, Kolkata. On the planning side, developed budgets worth Rs 150 crore+ for luxury apartments in Dum Dum, Kolkata. As a designer vetted 500+ drawings and supported consulting teams for auxiliary works designs.

positions.subtitle: Megalith, IIT Kharagpur
positions.description: Led a team of 55 students to execute the 2017 edition largest civil engineering tech-fest in India, improved revenue generation by 68% through increased sponsorship deals and improved publicity penetration in eastern India.
positions.title: Coordinator
positions.description_html: Led a team of 55 students to execute the 2017 edition largest civil engineering tech-fest in India, improved revenue generation by 68% through increased sponsorship deals and improved publicity penetration in eastern India. <!---->

experience.title: Design and Development Intern
experience.description: Assigned the Utalika project - a 1.2mn sqft ultra-luxury residential project in eastern Kolkata, the job was to understand various aspects of engineering design, project management, technical co-ordination and to propose improvements, with over 10 consultants for various technical affairs. Successfully executed design changes to the substructure system of all 6 residential towers, bringing the cost of the project down by 16.7 crores. Consequently was offered a full-time role for contributions to the project.

Successfully executed design changes to the substructure system of all 6 residential towers, bringing the cost of the project down by 16.7 crores. Consequently was offered a full-time role for contributions to the project.
